data.title: How to pronounce Toth? (RECOMMENDED)
data.meta_description: How do you say Toth? Learn how Toth is pronounced in different countries and languages with audio and phonetic spellings along with additional information, such as, type of name, other spellings, meaning
data.text:
The pronunciation rhyming with "both" is the more common and is closer to the original Hungarian pronunciation (without the glide, however). The alternate, certainly less common, pronunciation is an Americanized variant based on the analogy to "cloth," "broth," "wroth," "moth," etc.

You need to sajt the รณ(o(aw)) long like a half a second.

The pronunciation rhyming with "both" is the more common and is closer to the original Hungarian pronunciation (without the glide, however). The alternate, certainly less common, pronunciation is an Americanized variant based on the analogy to "cloth," "broth," "wroth," "moth," etc.
